settings.editor: YOUR WELL BEING IS IN THE FIRST PLACE.

For your face and body, the Ultimate SPA‎, our hotel brand that offers “infinite beauty and pristine luxury”, known for its anti-ageing therapy and wellness effect.  An invitation to total joy of life !
Our signature treatments purify, hydrate and regenerate your skin, solutions are perfectly suited to your needs and wishes. Choose between  a hot stone treatment, or a special men’s treatment.

It's being said that we have one of the best baths in town. And although we are flattered to hear that, we think that every guest has to form their own opinion.
People who ever tried our SPA treatments and facilities, always come back for some more. Because, we really have everything for your well-being.
